notesStmt.note: Salt or mould efflorescence. Edge damage, surface abrasion, tears, and losses. Text partly illegible. Some old patches with red rot. Dark, hard or stretchy edges from manufacture. Ink often flaked away. Pleats and folds occasionally obscure text. Some parts very wormed at edges and joins.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.
